resources.string: Move your finger on the screen in the same way as you would try to reach number on a number pad. Release to select the number, move far to the left to delete the last digit. Move far up twice to dial.
Move your finger on the screen up or down to select an item. Double tab to select the current item.
Move your finger on the screen up or down to select an item. Double tab to select the current item.
Ooooops ! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help fix the issue !
